column4: Hi all.  I'm mid-upgrade to Karmic from Jaunty and the upgrade has stopped at "Disabling Laptop Mode" for ~5mins now. Anyone got any suggestions on what to do now?
Quite a few people have had issues after upgrading, but in your case  the upgrade has crashed or something.
9.10 is a good one to clean install anyway,   Ext4 by default and Grub 2 for clean installs
I was hoping not to have to do that :-)  Oh well!
